name: Pack - A - Pizza
description:
This game was made for the quarantine Jam, in less than 2 days.

In pack a Pizza, you play as a pizza packager who needs to quickly make pizzas

and package them carefully. How long can you last?

Resources:

Free lo-fi Music:

https://chadderbox.itch.io/free-lofi

Free retro SFX:

https://opengameart.org/content/sfx-the-ultimate-2017-16-bit-mini-pack

If you have any trouble with the webGL version, I'll recommend you download the exe file.
